item.title: 科拉诺维奇离职引发 1999 年华尔街回响
item.description: 华尔街已经有大约 25 年没有认真猎熊了。现在看来，另一场狩猎又要开始了。【原文：It’s been about 25 years since Wall Street had a serious bear hunt. And it appears another one is starting up now.】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特效应可能成为英国央行利率制定者的最新难题
item.description: 英格兰银行的利率制定者们在寻找服务业通胀已经降温到足以打开降息大门的迹象时，可能会遇到一个新的难题：如何应对泰勒-斯威夫特效应。【原文：Bank of England rate-setters may have a new conundrum as they look for signs that services inflation has cooled by enough to open the door to interest rate cuts: how to deal with the Taylor Swift effect.】

item.title: 英国斯坦洛炼油厂将建造欧洲首座氢能发电厂
item.description: Essar Energy Transition 是英格兰西北部斯坦洛炼油厂的运营商，计划在该厂建设欧洲首座氢能发电厂。【原文：Essar Energy Transition, operator of the Stanlow oil refinery in northwest England, plans to build Europe’s first hydrogen-ready power plant at the site.】

item.title: 外国人以多年未见的速度购买南非债券
item.description: 由于美联储越来越接近降息，南非政府债券的收益率在新兴市场中名列前茅，外国投资者周四买入了两年多来最多的南非政府债券。【原文：Foreign investors bought the most South African government bonds in more than two years on Thursday, attracted by yields among the highest in emerging markets as the Federal Reserve gets closer to cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 据天空电视台报道，力拓正在研究对泰克的潜在竞购提案
item.description: 天空新闻》援引未透露身份的消息来源报道称，力拓集团正在研究对包括泰克资源有限公司在内的公司的潜在竞购方案。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is studying proposals for potential bids for companies including Teck Resources Ltd., Sky News reported citing sources it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 日本央行账目显示日本在美国消费者物价指数公布后采取干预措施提振日元
item.description: 根据彭博社对各国央行账户的分析，在周四美国通胀数据公布后不久，日本很可能在今年第三次进入货币市场支撑日元。【原文：Japan likely stepped into currency markets for a third time this year to prop up the yen soon after US inflation data came out Thursday, according to a Bloomberg analysis of central bank accounts.】

item.title: 需求疲软，中国信贷增长不及预期
item.description: 中国 6 月份信贷增长低于预期，在信心疲软的迹象下，中国的经济前景又增添了新的忧虑。【原文：China’s credit expanded less than expected in June, adding fresh worries to the country’s economic outlook amid signs of weak confidence.】

item.title: 意大利银行重新分类贷款组合后，BFF 飙升
item.description: BFF Bank SpA攀升，因为这家意大利贷款机构在意大利银行的调查中重新对其贷款组合进行了分类，以满足意大利银行的要求。【原文：BFF Bank SpA climbed after the Italian lender reclassified its loan portfolio to address Bank of Italy requests amid a probe.】

item.title: 习近平召开党代会，中国跳过季度GDP发布会
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在北京召集中共官员召开政策会议，中国将打破每月召开新闻发布会回答经济数据问题的传统。【原文：China will break its tradition for holding a monthly press conference to answer questions on economic data, as President Xi Jinping convenes Communist Party officials for a policy meeting in Beijing.】

item.title: 当地资金涌向印尼银行的高收益印尼盾债务
item.description: 印尼银行印尼盾证券的高利率吸引了更多的国内资金，这表明印尼银行可能会消耗当地的流动性，而不是引进外资。【原文：High rates on Bank Indonesia’s rupiah securities are drawing in more domestic funds, showing how it may sap local liquidity rather than bring in foreign capital.】

item.title: 普京与习近平会晤后俄罗斯从中国的进口再次增长
item.description: 尽管美国威胁对莫斯科的主要交易所实施二级制裁和限制引发了外贸支付困难，但俄罗斯从中国的进口在 6 月份开始恢复。【原文：Russian imports from China began to recover in June despite difficulties with foreign trade payments triggered by the US’s threat of secondary sanctions and restrictions on Moscow’s main exchange.】

item.title: 法国左翼努力团结一致解决总理难题
item.description: 在法国临时大选中联合起来赢得最多席位的左翼政党正努力团结起来，以提出总理候选人。【原文：The left-wing parties that banded together to win the biggest number of seats in France’s snap election are struggling to unite to come up with a candidate for prime minister.】

item.title: 据说《商业内幕》的所有者阿克塞尔-斯普林格将考虑分家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拥有 Politico 和 Business Insider 的德国媒体集团 Axel Springer SE 的所有者正在讨论将公司的媒体资产从数字广告和分类业务中分离出来。【原文：The owners of Axel Springer SE, the German media group that owns Politico and Business Insider, are discussing splitting the company’s media assets from its digital advertising and classifieds businesses, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 牛津大学研究发现诺和诺德的 Ozempic 可降低痴呆症发病率
item.description: 在牛津大学的一项研究中，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的Ozempic与降低痴呆症和其他一系列精神问题的发病率有关，这项研究提高了人们对这种糖尿病药物潜在辅助益处的期望。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S’s Ozempic was linked to lower rates of dementia and a range of other mental problems in a University of Oxford study that raises expectations about the diabetes drug’s potential ancillary benefits.】

item.title: 因担忧人工智能推动股价上涨，瑞银下调特斯拉评级
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）下调了特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s stock is downgraded by UBS Group AG, on concerns that the US electric carmaker’s shares have risen “too much, too soon” on optimism over its artificial intelligence plans.】

item.title: 至关重要的越南咖啡出口将持续到年底
item.description: 世界上最大的罗布斯塔咖啡种植国越南的咖啡出口很可能在年底前持续紧张，这将给2024年飙升近三分之二的价格带来更大压力。【原文：Coffee exports from Vietnam — the world’s biggest robusta grower — are likely to stay tight through the year-end, putting more pressure on prices that have jumped by almost two-thirds in 2024.】

item.title: 奢侈品困境，北欧银行忧郁：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 随着下周财报季的到来，卡地亚（Cartier）的所有者历峰集团（Richemont SA）和风衣制造商博柏利公司（Burberry Plc）将面临挑战性的去年同期比较。对于这两家公司来说，去年第一财季恰逢中国从封闭中重新崛起，在需求在今年晚些时候下滑之前实现了增长。【原文：Cartier-owner Richemont SA and trenchcoat-maker Burberry Plc face challenging year-earlier comparisons when they report next week as earnings season returns in earnest. For both, last year’s fiscal first quarter coincided with China’s re-emergence from lockdown, offering growth before demand swooned later in the year.】

item.title: 伊姆兰-汗因议会席位问题获得巴基斯坦法院救济
item.description: 巴基斯坦最高法院决定将今年选举中的二十几个席位让给总理谢赫巴兹-谢里夫的竞争对手，从而削弱了政府通过改革的能力。【原文：A Pakistan top court has decided to hand two dozen seats from this year’s elections to Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s rivals, undermining the government’s ability to pass through reforms.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格有望创四月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 随着该地区供应风险的缓解，欧洲天然气价格有望创下两个多月来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：European natural gas prices are poised for their biggest weekly loss in over two months as the region’s supply risks ease.】

item.title: 美国通胀减弱提振情绪，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 由于美国通胀放缓以及美联储 9 月份降息的可能性上升，投资者情绪高涨，欧洲股市周五开盘时走高。【原文：European stocks ticked higher at the open on Friday as slowing US inflation and rising probabilities for the Federal Reserve to cut rates in September lifted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 据说招商局资本和 KKR 考虑竞购 Loscam
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，招商局资本和包括 KKR & Co. 在内的私募股权基金是考虑竞购托盘制造商洛斯卡姆亚太有限公司的公司之一。【原文：China Merchants Capital and private equity funds including KKR & Co. are among firms considering bids for pallet maker Loscam Asia Pacific Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非西开普省暴风雨导致 35,000 所房屋受损
item.description: 南非西开普省执行市长吉奥丁-希尔-刘易斯（Geordin Hill-Lewis）说，袭击该省的暴风雨已导致开普敦市 35,000 多户家庭遭受洪灾损失。【原文：Storms that pounded South Africa’s Western Cape province have led to flood damage affecting more than 35,000 households in the city of Cape Town, Executive Mayor Geordin Hill-Lewis said.】

item.title: 印尼盾将迎来八年来最长涨势，普拉博沃寻求缓解债务担忧
item.description: 印尼为缓解对国家财政前景的担忧而采取的举措，以及对美联储进一步降息的押注不断增加，使印尼盾出现了近八年来的最佳涨势。【原文：Indonesia’s moves to ease concern over the nation’s fiscal outlook and growing bets for more Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts sent the rupiah on its best rally in almost eight years.】

item.title: 瑞典 6 月通胀支持瑞典央行进一步降息
item.description: 瑞典上个月的基本通胀率放缓幅度超过预期，为瑞典央行继续降低借贷成本铺平了道路。【原文：Sweden’s underlying inflation slowed more than expected last month, paving the way for the Riksbank to continue taking borrowing costs lower.】

item.title: 日本家庭预期通胀将创历史之最
item.description: 日本家庭认为未来几年的通胀率将达到创纪录的水平，随着日元的快速贬值加大了对生活成本的压力，通胀率的上升将支持日本央行在短期内提高利率。【原文：Japan’s households see inflation at record levels over the coming years, an uptick that will support the case for the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates in the near-term as the yen’s rapid depreciation ramps up pressure on the cost of living.】

item.title: 富时 250 指数创两年多来最高水平
item.description: 伦敦金融城英格兰银行（BOE）外的行人。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Pedestrians outside the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 香港公司可能在伦敦上市可扩大资本池
item.description: 在香港上市的长江基建控股有限公司（CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd.）可能在伦敦上市，这被视为一项战略举措，有利于吸引更多投资者，促进海外收购。【原文：The potential listing of Hong Kong-traded CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. in London is seen as a strategic move to access a larger pool of investors and facilitate overseas acquisitions.】

item.title: 日元飙升后日本内需驱动型股市反弹
item.description: 受内需推动的日本股市（包括家具连锁店 Nitori Holdings Co.【原文：Japanese stocks driven by domestic demand, including furniture chain Nitori Holdings Co., climbed after the yen’s sudden surge overnight boosted speculation the currency will strengthen and lower import costs.】

item.title: 随着利率检查和疑似干预的影响减弱，日元下滑
item.description: 周五，随着日本当局疑似干预和利率检查的积极影响开始消退，日元在波澜不惊的交易中下滑。【原文：The yen slipped in choppy trading on Friday as the positive impact of suspected intervention and rate checks by Japanese authorities began to fade.】
